channel.title: [REQUEST] Color Wheel Paint Gun
channel.description:
Simply put, would like to see a Paint Gun that has broader color selection via color wheel or something similar. That would allow for a more personal touch on our factories. Not sure how to mod for that. Would offer suggestions or request help building the mod if I could. Sadly, I am not that savvy.
Thanks!
